required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation Of Clinical Efficacy And Immunogenicity Of Eritromax® Produced By Lab Blau Pharmaceutical S / A. Compared To The Product Eprex®, Produced By The Laboratory Janssen-Cilag, In Patients With Anemia Secondary To Chronic Kidney Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: L.A.L Clinica Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento Ltda.

clinical_study.source: L.A.L Clinica Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento Ltda.

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the clinical efficacy and immunogenicity of the drug test Eritromax ® - (rHuEPO Blau) compared to drug Eprex ® (Janssen-Cilag rHuEPO) in the treatment of patients who have anemia secondary to chronic kidney disease (CKD), during the correction through assessing the change in hemoglobin levels.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Change of serum Hb (baseline vs end of treatment (EOIT)

intervention.description: The drug will be administered subcutaneously and the initial dose is 50 IU / kg. This dose will be administrated twice/week, totaling 100 U / kg / week.

facility.name: Instituto Scribner de Ensino, Pesquisa, Ciência e Tecnologia
União Brasileira de Educação e Assistência Hospital São Lucas da PUCRS
Irmandade da Santa Casa de Misericórdia de Porto Alegre
Fundação Oswaldo Cruz (Hospital do Rim e Hipertensão)
Real e Benemérita Associação Portuguesa de Beneficência São Paulo (Hospital Beneficência Portuguesa)
